headline: How the Narrative Surrounding eBay Is Shifting After Recent Analyst Upgrades and Caution
summary: eBay’s latest stock narrative reflects a slightly higher conviction rather than a wholesale rethink, with fair value steady at roughly $94 per share and revenue growth assumptions still anchored around 5.2% as Wall Street takes a more constructive, yet cautious, stance. A small reduction in the discount rate to about 8.91% encapsulates the view that execution in focus categories and improving GMV trends modestly lower perceived risk without eliminating concerns about longer term competitive...
